questions.question: What is the typical carrier concentration of a metal?
What is the typical carrier concentration of Semiconductor?
What is the magnetic field strength for a pole distance of 1 cm and 200mA current in a typical Helmholtz set up?
It is interesting to note that there are four wires going through the probe. What could be the reason for using 4 wires instead of two ?

answers.a: Two wires for measuring current and two wires for measuring voltage
answers.b: one wire for measuring current two wires for measuring magnetic field and one wire to measure voltage
answers.c: two wires for measuring magnetic field and two wires for measuring carrier concentration
answers.d: one wire to measure current, one for voltage, one for magnetic field and one for carrier concentration.

questions.question: What do you think about the nature of current in probe and in the electromagne

answers.a: AC current in Probe and AC current in magnet
answers.b: DC current in probe and AC current in Magnet
answers.c: DC current in Probe and DC current in magnet
answers.d: AC current in Probe and DC current in magnet
